message: Starting analysis of MCP tool responses to identify orchestrator confusion scenarios
Analyzing tool responses for confusion patterns - found guidance fields in phase tools but inconsistent formats
Creating comprehensive confusion analysis document with specific examples from real_mcp_server.py

Completed confusion analysis. Created comprehensive document at confusion_analysis.md identifying 6 major confusion categories affecting 16 MCP tools. Key findings: error responses lack recovery actions, implicit state transitions not communicated, and inconsistent guidance formats across tools.
